mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat (chat_message, send_time, store_id, user_id, sender_type, store_no) VALUES (#{chatMessage}, #{sendTime}, #{storeId}, #{userId}, #{senderType}, #{storeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, latest_messages.lastMessageTime AS lastMessageTime, latest_messages.chat_message AS lastMessage, u.user_img_url AS userImgUrl FROM users u JOIN chat c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN ( SELECT user_id, store_id, MAX(send_time) AS lastMessageTime, chat_message FROM chat WHERE store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY user_id, store_id, chat_message ) AS latest_messages ON c.user_id = latest_messages.user_id AND c.store_id = latest_messages.store_id AND c.send_time = latest_messages.lastMessageTime WHERE c.store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY c.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_img_url, latest_messages.lastMessageTime, latest_messages.chat_message ORDER BY lastMessageTime DESC
